instanceVariables.name: sliderHandleAttachedBar
instanceVariables.desc: the ID of the slider bar

instanceVariables.name: sliderHandleValue
instanceVariables.desc: the value for this slider handle

instanceVariables.name: sliderHandleValueLast
instanceVariables.desc: the last recorded slider value, for recording any changes

instanceVariables.name: sliderHandleProgress
instanceVariables.desc: read only - as opposed to slider value, this is just from 0 to 1

instanceVariables.name: sliderHandleRuleLesser
instanceVariables.desc: if not empty, enter id of other handle this one must be lesser than

instanceVariables.name: sliderHandleRuleGreater
instanceVariables.desc: if not empty, enter id of other handle this one must be greater than

instanceVariables.name: sliderHandleRuleAllowEqual
instanceVariables.desc: if lesser/greater rules allows value to be equal to other handle

instanceVariables.name: scroller
instanceVariables.desc: is this a scroller (used for a scroll view, with a uiCanvas and uiScrollComponents)

instanceVariables.name: scrollerUseCanvas
instanceVariables.desc: enter a canvas ID to use it as the bounds of the scroll view

instanceVariables.name: scrollerMargins
instanceVariables.desc: margins to pad around scroll view bounds

instanceVariables.name: scrollerSpeed
instanceVariables.desc: how many pixels to scroll per step
